Posts.Content: lifeisbe wrote: I have been on zometa for 1.5 years and a spur is protruding from the rib, not cancer. This could be due to hypoposphatasia as the blood test reveal that the alkaline phosphate has become so low. Should I stop Zometa? or is that really related to Zometa, any one experience the same problem?Â  Log in to post a reply
